name: Ada Okeke
quote: Modella removed the stress of choosing what to wear. I look put-together without spending 30 minutes in front of my closet.

name: Kofi Boateng
quote: The AI suggestions helped me build a cohesive wardrobe. I buy less and wear more—everything works together now.

name: Zainab Sule
quote: I finally have everyday outfits that feel like ‘me’. The budget-friendly picks are a lifesaver.

name: Daniel Chukwuma
quote: Decision fatigue is gone. My morning routine is faster, and I still get compliments at work.

name: Amaka Lawson
quote: Modella keeps me looking polished for client meetings—without hiring a stylist.

name: Yusuf Rahman
quote: The capsule wardrobe recommendations fit my lifestyle. Smart, versatile, and easy to maintain.
